If it isn't getting to BIOS, it is either a BIOS bug, malware that infects BIOS, or hardware failure. Malware that sophisticated is unlikely. Check your manufacturer's website regarding BIOS bugs. Hardware is tricky. It could be anything from a capacitor to a chip.
